org.openxava.tab.impl

Interface ITabProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDataReader, ISearch
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JDBCTabProvider, JPATabProvider, TabProviderBase

    public interface ITabProvider
extends ISearch, IDataReader
    Provides data and specific behavior from the underlying query technology.

    Author:
    Javier Paniza
